00136 /*

00139 
00140 clWriter::clWriter(const char *fName, enFormat format, clGeometry &geometry)
00141 {
00142   char tempName[50];
00143   strcpy(tempName, fName);
00144 
00145   switch(format)
00146   {
00147     case foGnu:
00148       fileName       = strdup(strcat(tempName, ".gnu"));
00149       fileNameLength = (int) (strlen(fileName));
00150       WriteGnu(geometry);
00151       break;
00152     case foTec:
00153       fileName       = strdup(strcat(tempName, ".tec"));
00154       fileNameLength = (int) (strlen(fileName));
00155       WriteTec(geometry);
00156       break;
00157     default:
00158       throw clExceptionTree("clWriter", "clWriter", "Unknown format specification.");
00159       break;
00160   }
00161 }
00162 
00163 clWriter::~clWriter(void)
00164 {
00165   if(fileName) delete [] fileName;
00166 }
